LanguageData.RoyaltyTips.FreePsychicAmplifier: The Empire bestows a free psychic ability for every noble title earned.
LanguageData.RoyaltyTips.IllegalImplantUse: Psychic neuroformers can be acquired through quests.
LanguageData.RoyaltyTips.PsycastAdvantage: Psychic powers can give you significant advantage in combat.
LanguageData.RoyaltyTips.EltexGear: Dressing your psions in eltex gear will improve the strength and reliability of their psychic abilities.
